column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Regarding our restrooms
column2: I regret that when we first built our establishment
column3: we weren't anticipating the amount of people who would be coming through our doors at any given moment. No restaurant is perfect
column5: we most definitely would have made the restrooms larger. So on behalf of my entire staff
column6: I do appreciate your not having lowered your rating for that reason.
